event_text: The bots worked hard to gather plenty of fuel, but woke up to find footprints leading away from their rations, and missing food.

m_c woke up in the middle of the night to a strange noise. No one else was awake, or so they thought, until seeing someone at their rations. Before m_c could realize their mistake, hostile optics glared at them, ensuring the others wakes up to find their berth empty, and the fuel gone.
m_c was taking some fuel from the storage only to find a swarm of scraplets! In the midst of battle, they called to r_c for help. Together they fought off the scraplets, but not without their losses.
history_text: Was eaten by scraplets, while defending the rations.
a swarm of scraplets, while defending their fuel.

event_text: m_c was taking some prey from the fresh-kill pile only to find a swarm of rats! In the midst of battle, they called to r_c for help. Together they fought off the rats, but got injured in the process.
history_text: Was hurt while defending the fresh-kill pile from a swarm of rats.
Died from their wounds after defending the fresh-kill pile from a swarm of rats.
defending the fresh-kill pile from a swarm of rats

event_text: m_c was taking some prey from the fresh-kill pile only to find a swarm of rats! While m_c managed to fight off every last rat, they got injured in the process.
history_text: Was hurt while defending the fresh-kill pile from a swarm of rats.
Died from their wounds after defending the fresh-kill pile from a swarm of rats.
defending the fresh-kill pile from a swarm of rats
